name: ReFlex Gallery » WordPress Photo Gallery
author: HahnCreativeGroup

sections.description:
WordPress Photo Gallery

ReFlex Gallery is a fully responsive WordPress photo gallery plugin that is actually two galleries in one. ReFlex Gallery uses a FlexSlider style gallery for all mobile devices with a screen width of 480 pixels or less and dynamically creates prettyPhoto style galleries for all screen widths above 480 pixels. ReFlex Gallery allows for multiple galleries per page.

Photo Gallery features

  • Responsive photo galleries (works on smart devices)
  • Two gallery types in one (prettyPhoto modal pop-up and FlexSlider for mobile devices)
  • Include multiple galleries on a page or post
  • Set the ‘sort order’ of images in the galleries
  • WordPress ShortCodes for easy content integration
  • And much more…
  • German translation added (Deutsch Übersetzung hinzugefügt)
  • Portuguese translation added (Tradução em português adicionado)

WordPress Plugins

Be sure to also check out these other plugins for WordPress:
WP Easy Gallery,
WP Easy Gallery Pro,
Custom Post Donations Pro,
Custom Post Donations,
WP Translate,
WP Translate Pro,
Email Obfuscate,
Prosperity.

Gallery Plugin License Notice

The developer of this plugin is not in any way affiliated to the developer of the prettyPhoto jQuery plugin.
prettyPhoto is being developed by Stephane Caron and licensed under the GPLv2 license. As the developer states, prettyPhoto is “totally free to use (…) in all projects, even commercial ones”.

For more information on prettyPhoto please visit the project page:
prettyPhoto project page

FlexSlider is licensed by woothemes under the GPLv2 license.

Please consider a donation to the author of prettyPhoto in order to support the project!

Plugins for WordPress by HahnCreativeGroup.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the reflex-gallery directory to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Create new galleries in the Add Gallery Panel
  4. Add images to galleries in the Add Images Panel
  5. Add generated shortcode to content to display gallery
sections.faq:
What is the best way to load images?

  • Click the ‘Upload Image’ button
  • Select the ‘From Computer’ tab
  • Click the ‘Select Files’ button
  • Choose the desired image to upload
  • After image has completed, click the ‘Insert into post’ button

Does ReFlex Gallery display galleries properly on smart phones?

  • Yes, ReFlex Gallery uses responsive techniques to provide optimal smart device display.

Why can’t I add galleries to my site?

  • ReFlex Gallery requires PHP 5 to work properly, please check your web hosting configurations.

Keywords: WordPress gallery plugin, Easy Gallery
sections.changelog:
v3.1.6

  • Added ‘None’ to thumbnail style options

v3.1.5

  • Updated prettyPhoto.js file to fix security issue

v3.1.4

  • Fixed critical security issue

v3.1.3

  • Fixed issue of gallery info not updating on Edit Gallery page
  • Additional security fixes

v3.1.2

  • Verified WordPress 3.9.2 compatibility

v3.1.1

  • i18n update

v3.1

  • Added short code button to editor window
  • Tightening of security around previous security exploit

v3.0.1

  • Fixes security exploit

v3.0

  • Table paging results per page now retains state when saving image changes
  • Table paging now retains which page of results you were on when saving image changes
  • Ability to select fade style for thumbnail

v2.5

  • Added option to turn thumbnail dropshadow on/off.

v2.4

  • replaced deprecated mysql_* functions for WordPress 3.9 compatibility.

v2.3

  • Enhanced thumbnail styling (CSS added)

v2.2

  • Changed how image info edits are saved to allow all edits to be saved in a single action.

v2.1

  • Fixed directory naming issue on add-images page that caused problems with prettyPhoto scripts in some hosting environments.

v2.0

  • Added ability to hide prettyPhoto gallery overlay
  • Added ability to hide prettyPhoto social sharing buttons
  • Added ability to add custom thumbnail styles

v1.4.8

  • Updated prettyPhoto (v3.1.5) and FlexSlider (v2.1) scripts
  • Additional work for I18n

v1.4.7

  • Improved form submission security

v1.4.6

  • Imported jQuery Migrate script

v1.4.5

  • Fixed bug causing SSL and Mixed Content Warnings

v1.4.4

  • Update to prettyPhoto stylesheet to correct arrow alignment and mini-gallery spilling over popup

v1.4.3

  • Sanitize outputs to protect against cross-site scripting

v1.4.2

  • Added jQuery Migrate script for jQuery 1.9.1 compatibility

v1.4.1

  • Fixed additional directory naming issue that caused problems with prettyPhoto styles in some hosting environments.

v1.4

  • Fixed directory naming issue that caused problems with prettyPhoto scripts in some hosting environments.

v1.3

  • Fixed issue causing gallery to jump when clicked on.

v1.2

  • Fixed bug causing empty images to be added to a gallery when switching galleries.

v1.1

  • Fixed bug that was preventing images from being properly deleted.

v1.0

  • Initial release.
